name: OR_LNLG_PREOP_SKIN_DRY
description: This table stores information about whether skin was dry during pre-op prep.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREOP_PREP_SKIN_DRY_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for whether the skin was dry during pre-op preparation.
